summary: Sarah Smith, an artist and government hydrologist, sets out on a post-fire stream survey in a remote part of the Kalmiopsis Wilderness of southwestern Oregon. In the course of her journey ... See full summary Â»
cast: Lily Rabe|Jason Butler Harner|Isaac C. Singleton Jr.|Jim Cody Williams|Fiona Dourif|Don McManus|Karen Black|Jeri Arredondo|Skyler Brigmann|Gregory Bennett|Quinton Fay|David Melville|Bobby Plasencia|Philip Briggs|Jessica Noboa|Jim Leske|Martin Harris|Beresford Bennett|Jesse Gee
title: Letters from the Big Man
